sentences.en: Chloral hydrate is a rapidly effective hypnotic.
sentences.cn: 水合氯醛为一种作用迅速的催眠药.

sentences.en: ConclusionWuweizi Ningshen Oral Liquid possesses obvious sedative, hypnotic and anti - convulsion effects.
sentences.cn: 结论五味子宁神口服液有明显的镇静 、 催眠、 抗 惊厥作用.

sentences.en: Everyone is familiar with the TV screen's hypnotic power.
sentences.cn: 大家都很熟悉电视屏幕的吸引力。

sentences.en: His songs are often both hypnotic and reassuringly pleasant.
sentences.cn: 他的歌声经常让人在沉醉的同时又感到放松愉悦。

sentences.en: His voice had a smooth hypnotic effect .
sentences.cn: 他的声音有一种温柔的催眠效果。

sentences.en: His voice had an almost hypnotic effect.
sentences.cn: 他的声音有一种近乎催眠的作用。

sentences.en: Hypnotic is what can you make person generation bad really psychedelic?
sentences.cn: 催眠术真的可以让人产生不好的幻觉 吗 ?

sentences.en: Look at screen in oneself, you can feel oneself by hypnotic.
sentences.cn: 看着屏幕里的自己, 你会觉得自己被催眠了.

sentences.en: She was again the victim of the city's hypnotic influence.
sentences.cn: 城市催眠般的魅力又一次让她上当受气.

sentences.en: the hypnotic beat of the drum
sentences.cn: 让人昏昏欲睡的击鼓节奏

sentences.en: The hypnotic eyes gazed into his own.
sentences.cn: 那双眼睛叫人昏昏欲睡,紧紧盯着温斯顿看.

sentences.en: The hypnotic state actually lies somewhere between being awake and being asleep.
sentences.cn: 催眠状态实际上介乎清醒和睡眠之间。

sentences.en: The hypnotic subject is very suggestible.
sentences.cn: 受催眠治疗的病人,在精神上是易受影响的.

sentences.en: The noise of the wind took on some kind of rhythm, becoming hypnotic.
sentences.cn: 风声象一首有节奏的催眠曲.

sentences.en: This a hypnotic way to ask for a referral.
sentences.cn: 这时争取转介绍客户的催眠方式.

sentences.en: Watch some TV; drama sells! Hypnotic sales professionals are master storytellers.
sentences.cn: 看看电视, 舞台表演式销售! 催眠式销售人员都是故事大王.

sentences.en: Your hypnotic eyes will capture the hearts of those who interest you.
sentences.cn: 你迷人的眼神会捕获追求者的心.

trans.tran_en: making you feel tired or unable to pay attention to anything else, especially because of a regularly repeated sound or movement
a drug that helps you to sleep
